I'm Hasanth.

In this blog, I write articles on topics - Theoretical Computer Science, Maths, Competitve Programming, System hacks & other technical stuff, which I expect would serve both as - an account of my thoughts, progress & also as a comprehensive knowledge resource, for the interested.

In addition, I also publish articles on substack, on topics which are of more general concern - Public Policy, Economics, Psychology, Book Reviews/Summaries etc., some of them are free, if you like the content & wish to read more, subscribe below.
